meanings.definition: A reckless person who enjoys taking risks
meanings.sent1: The daredevil jumped off the swing at the highest point.
meanings.sent2: The daredevil rode his skateboard down the steep hill with no fear.
meanings.sent3: The daredevil decided to try skydiving for the first time, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Watching the daredevil perform stunts on the motorcycle was like witnessing magic.
meanings.sent5: The daredevil's bravery in the face of danger was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To engage in daring or reckless behavior
meanings.sent1: She dared to daredevil by climbing the tall tree without any safety gear.
meanings.sent2: He loves to daredevil by swimming in the deep ocean waters during a storm.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to daredevil by sneaking into the abandoned house at night.
meanings.sent4: The young boy dared to daredevil by trying to jump over the large gap on his bike.
meanings.sent5: Despite the warnings, he continued to daredevil by driving too fast on the icy road.
